f1st: 1st place: 1 extra private lesson (30min) + 5% discount on next month's tuition + 200 points the following month
s2nd: 2nd place: 5% discount on next month's tuition + 150 points the following month;
uplevel: Level Up (5% discount on the following month upon qualification)
t3000: Qualification only for those with AT LEAST 3000 points in the month!
timelineExplanationText: Our classification system is a true celebration of your dedication! Every task completed, every goal achieved, and every step taken towards fluency is an opportunity to earn points and shine! We have two types of scoring: the MONTHLY SCORE, which is reset every new month, and the TOTAL SCORE, which accumulates over time. Each month, we highlight the leaders of the monthly score, offering exclusive discounts or extra classes as a reward, and monitor the total progress of each student, propelling them to new levels of fluency. It's not just a competition; it's an exciting journey towards linguistic excellence!
retome: Pick up exactly where you left off in your last lesson. Continue your learning without interruptions, reviewing concepts already studied and advancing at your own pace.
revise: Review and reinforce your learning with interactive flashcards. Efficiently memorize vocabulary, expressions and grammar for long-term retention.
pratique: Practice your listening and pronunciation with authentic audio. Improve your listening comprehension through interactive exercises and learn to recognize different accents and intonations.
enrique√ßa: Enrich your vocabulary by encountering real sentences in different contexts. Discover new words, learn natural structures and see English being used in practice.
access: Here, you have access to everything you need to continue with your English studies!
earn: Earn 100 points by adding this word to your flashcards!
earned: You've earned 100 points by adding this word to your flashcards!
